TextView.android:text: What month/ year were you born - Month
Do you have a mobile number?
If YES, what is your mobile number
If YES, what is your mobile2 number
Does your husband or family member have a mobile number?
If YES, can I record that number
If YES, can I record that number
During your pregnancy, did you know when your baby was due to be born?
Do you know if any of these methods were used to calculate when your baby was due?
How many antenatal check-ups did you have?
How many months pregnant were you when you went for your first antenatal check-up?
How many months pregnant were you when you delivered your baby?
Did someone listen to your baby’s heart sound when you were admitted to the labour ward?
Where did you deliver your baby?
What date was your baby born? (dd/mm/yy)
What time was your baby born? (24 hrs clock)
Was the baby born by vaginal delivery, forceps, vacuum, assisted breach or caesarean section?
If you had a caesarean section, did anyone tell you the reason for the caesarean section?
If yes, then what was the reason?
Was your baby weighed at birth?
How much did your baby weigh? (grams)
Did you have any complications after birth?
If yes, what were the complications after birth?
After your baby was born which ward were you moved to?
After your baby was born, which ward did your baby go to?
After your baby was born, how many nights did you stay in the hospital?
Did you receive a birth notification form or other relevant documentation to provide proof of the birth for your baby?
In addition to this notification, a baby should also receive birth certification. Did you receive this form?
Do you know how to obtain such a birth certificate for your baby?

RadioButton.android:text: Do not know/ Do not remember

TextView.android:text: When are you planning to get your birth certificate?
Do you have any concerns about getting a birth certificate?
If yes, what are your concerns?
